name: DEPENDENCE TEST
title: Understand Your Tobacco Dependence
instructions: Rate each statement on a scale of 1 to 5, where: 1 = Never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Frequently, 4 = Often, 5 = Always. Your highest score determines your primary dependence type and its severity level (Mild, Moderate, or Severe).

sections.name: physical
sections.title: Physical Dependence (Nicotine Addiction)
sections.description: Nicotine dependency causes withdrawal symptoms like cravings, anxiety, and fatigue.

questions.question: I use tobacco to keep from slowing down.
When I run out of tobacco, I find it unbearable.
I use tobacco to perk myself up.
I am very much aware of the times when I am not using tobacco.
I use tobacco to give myself a 'lift.'
I experience strong cravings if I miss my usual tobacco use.

sections.name: psychological
sections.title: Psychological Dependence (Emotional & Mental Triggers)
sections.description: Your tobacco use is driven by emotions like stress, anxiety, or pleasure.
